item.title: Day 175 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I went for a ride up to Nant today, the first descent that I did was Zorro and it felt pretty terrible. Balance was off and not feeling it. At the bottom I was feeling quite dehydrated though so I drank all of my water which meant that I needed …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 174 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Desperate times! Resistance bands. Why? In the last visit with my neurologist he demonstrated that my hip flexors were weakened, the right one especially so. He recommended that I do stretching and try to strengthen it. These resistance bands are a part of trying to strengthen it. Elysia's sister is …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 173 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This actually came on Monday. It's my new sit/stand desk. I was looking at electric ones for quite a while and probably would have bought an IKEA one if delivery wasn't 35 quid and they weren't £440 anyway. After looking around for a bit I found that there are …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 172 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Weather is still really, really hot so I took the afternoon off and went up to Myherin. All of the trails were riding great and I almost managed to ride the top of Truman clean. I also found some new trails to ride which was cool! It was hot enough …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 171 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Weather is seriously hot! I didn't want to ride today as leaving days between rides seems to make sure I don't have dead legs on a ride. Instead I talked Elysia into going for a short walk with me. Got a new view of the Waun and found an old …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 170 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Went up to Nant this evening and had a really fun ride. I even stopped for a brief play on the skills area. Tomorrow, our big blue sofa goes off to the big landfill in the sky tomorrow morning when the council pick it up. Pity to send stuff to …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 168 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Today I went for a ride in the Dyfi, I wanted to ride all of the descents that I know of on the Corris side. I started off with footpath and my balance was pretty screwy, it kind of set the tone for the rest of the ride. I didn't …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 167 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I went for a ride this evening, up to nant. I decided to play a new game of pedalling as much as I want at the start of a trail but as soon as I stop pedalling that's it, no more pedalling allowed. Got to keep things interesting somehow... My …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 166 - photo a day 2017
item.description: My legs have felt uncomfortable all day, no matter what I do they feel a bit bad so I didn't much fancy riding. Instead, this evening I did some bits and pieces; mowed the lawn, did the hoovering etc... I also made a new batch of homebrew using a Young's …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 165 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This evening I went for a ride on the Levo. It was going great, toboggan was riding great and the weather was nice. I decided to head out the top of nant on the Syfydin route. As I climbed up to the Bont Goch descent I was trying to choose …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 164 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Not much exciting today. I cleared/rearranged the garage a bit more, tended to chilli plants, prepped for another lot of homebrew and removed a sofa ready for collection by the council. I also did a bit of work on the roadrat which was quite overdue. Bled the brakes and …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 163 - photo a day 2017
item.description: As trying to get chillies to grow from seed is taking a while and is a bit trial and error I decided to cheat and buy a couple of adult plants. I bought a Demon Red plant and a Twilight plant from South Devon chilli farm. They arrived last Thursday …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 162 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Elysia and I went to Utopia coffee lounge to meet up with some of her friends. They all seemed really nice and the coffee shop was a comfy place to be. Whilst in the toilets there I thought saw this door... After coffee we had a meal with Elysia's family …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 161 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Today we chilled out with Elysia's parents and we to Patisserie valerie for coffee and cake in the afternoon. I broke my diet and had a piece of chocolate mousse cake, it was far too rich for me these days but I still managed to eat it all... I'm still …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 160 - photo a day 2017
item.description: We made it to Southend at 13:30 today, the drive took about 4.5 hours but wasn't too bad. A bit of traffic on the M25 and coming into Southend but otherwise a pretty smooth journey. We went out for food at Wings (Chinese) this evening which was really …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 159 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Today we began the journey to Southend-on-sea to visit Elysia's parents for the weekend. I didn't much fancy the entire drive after work though so we're staying at my Dad's tonight en-route. Today was also voting day so here's a photo of the polling station!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 158 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I went for a ride this evening but it wasn't the kind of weather to stop and take photos in. I went out on the roadrat as I'd like to go bivvying later in the year and I wanted to see where my legs are at. I think distance should …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 157 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This evening I dragged Elysia out for a walk when we went to Morrison's as there's a few nice paths down the back of it along the river. The river was really high and really fast. Walked over a bridge that I've never been on before! Nice to get out …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 156 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Another unexciting day but I made roasted tomato and red pepper soup. Another recipe from deliciously ella, it was really nice and I had some bread leftover from a loaf I made a couple of days ago with it. I thought that this looked quite nice so...
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 155 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This is the other bit of homebrew that takes a while, bottling. I've bottled half of the beer tonight and put some finings in the other half to bottle in a couple of days - want to see if it makes much difference to the finished process. I tried a thimbleful …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 154 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This is one of the worse bits of brewing beer IMO, preparing bottles for use. Having to put sterilisation powder into every bottle and then fill with hot water, leave, rinse out with cold water and then drain. Easy but just takes a little while.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 153 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Not much to say about today! My salad has come to fruition and today we sampled some of the leaves. Not much to say about that either but here they are!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 152 - photo a day 2017
item.description: 6 months into the year. That's gone quickly. I've not been sleeping right for a while now. My jawbone is telling me my deep sleep amount is well down, the majority of nights under 30 minutes. Whilst I take the figure itself with a pinch of salt I feel reasonably …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 151 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I got home and decided to check on the veggie patch, the mixed salad bits are doing well! They've grown considerably since I last checked them. I had to do a spot of weeding as there were a couple of dandelions sprouting up. In hindsight I maybe should left them …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 150 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Day 150! No exciting photo, in fact I strongly considered a post saying that I was stopping. I tried to convince Elysia to let me take a photo of her but she refused. I did make some Deliciously Ella energy balls though so they're gonna have to do. They're really …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 149 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I went for a very short ride today, I decided to ride something a bit different to usual on the way back. I rode the fireroad from Llyn Pendam to Cwmerfyn, bit of a different view to usual
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 148 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Didn't do much today either. A bit of work but mostly a bit of moping around. So, here's what my homebrew is looking like after a week. I'm slightly concerned about the oily looking sheen and lack of foam but google assures me that this isn't anything to worry about …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 147 - photo a day 2017
item.description: My suspension fluid for my fork damper arrived today so I decided to sort that job out. Pretty simple one! Didn't do much else with the day...
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 146 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Earlier in the week I booked today off as the forecast looked great. The forecast was correct! I'd planned to do a "sea to summit to sea" ride, something that's been on my radar since Dave and Pete rode it last year's solstice. The summit being Pumlumon, the nearest mountain …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 145 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Today was ridiculously nice out so I took a half day and went for a ride up at nant. I'm really running out of angles/places to take photos of up there now!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 144 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Went down to pick up my car after MOT today. All that needed fixing to get it to pass was a new caliper for the handbrake. This leaves me in a tricky spot as I quite fancy a new car that doesn't make strange noises but this car costs me …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 143 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Car gone off for MOT so had to go to Tescos on the roadrat. Whilst I was down there I decided to go for a spin down the seafront. It was clear down low but foggy higher up and out to sea.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 141 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Decided to go for another ride today, rode the same route as yesterday. It was, once again, great!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 140 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Today I picked my ebike up, at last! It's taken a while and cost a bit but I'm happy to have it back. I had a fun ride and it was great. I want to brew some beer for a get together in August and today the kit came. So …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 139 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Finally wanted to ride my bike again. However, I decided to try to accept that going fast isn't option and to just take it easy. To emphasise this I decided to take a beer with me. I only rode toboggan and gogerddan woods but it was fun.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 138 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This not feeling good about bikes and for some reason MS things are bothering me. Here's a photo of my chillies, first time I've managed to get seedlings from seed!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 137 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Not been great lately and really not wanting to ride. Instead this evening I went for a late evening walk at the harbour with Elysia. The tide was in so the sea was quite high, here it is!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 136 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This evening Elysia and I went to Medina, I had salmon. She had galette and we had hummus to share. The salmon was great and the garnish that came with it was really nice too. The segments of orange worked well with the honey glaze on the fish. Not got …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 135 - photo a day 2017
item.description: We went down to Swansea today to go to Morriston Hospital for my yearly appointment with my neurologist. Parking was, as usual, awful. There were cars everywhere, luckily we managed to pull into a not a space really quickly. We arrived a bit early as I wanted to leave a …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 133 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I did a rideout on the mega today, possibly the last I'm going to do on it. The ride started out well, I felt good. By midway up the leg burner my legs were starting to go into limp mode a bit and were starting to hurt. By the visitor …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 132 - photo a day 2017
item.description: A visit to Bronglais. Just a routine appointment with the MS nurse, nothing exciting! The hospital is a bit less attractive from this side. I only had to wait 5-10 minutes before being seen (and I was 5 mins early anyway) which was great. We quickly realised that actually the …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 130 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Gamebuildr meeting night has moved to Wednesdays. However, that's also pub quiz night in Brynamlwg so we've moved to the Arts Centre. Somehow, the is even more expensive!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 129 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Not much to say! On Monday I planted some chillies in my propagator in the hope that I get some seedlings. Fingers crossed!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 128 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Elysia's new hand carders turned up yesterday so this evening I helped her card some raw wool. Carders are used to get the wool ready for spinning, they get all of the strands straight and unmatted etc... They're basically 2 bits of wood with teeth on that you load up …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 127 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I had so much fun yesterday that I went back to the same trails today, although I didn't do part of the loop. I did one descent a couple of times and I had a good explore. It was rad. On my way back I also pushed up something that …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 126 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I actually had quite a busy day today. I woke up quite late at 9:15 having got around 10 hours of sleep! I cleaned up and photo'd some bike bits that I want to sell. Just as I finished doing that Elysia rang me and asked if I wanted …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 125 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Woohoo my mojo to ride has returned! I decided to drive up to the nant visitor centre and have a bit of a play on the skills area. I still have no skills so I decided to do a loop of the pendam trail. The weather was beautiful also a …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 124 - photo a day 2017
item.description: A very uninspiring day... The weather has been lovely and each day I leave work planning on going for a nice ride. On my ride home my legs always feel heavy and rubbish which really just kills my desire to ride so I don't. Anyway, my coriander has sprouted! If …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 123 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Another standard day. This evening I cleared out what used to be my office but has become a bit of a storage room. I mostly just moved stuff that belongs outside into the garage and then tidied up to leave some space and make the room a room again. My …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 122 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I didn't do anything exciting today! I did a bit of gamebuildr, I mowed the lawn and I pottered around the garden a bit. These flowers grow in my garden every year and they're quite resilient - even after being mowed they grow back pretty quickly. I did once find out …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 121 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I mostly just chilled out today but we went to Poppy's cafe (at Newman's garden centre) for breakfast for a fry up. Naturally, I went for the veggie option and was pleasantly surprised. The sausages weren't quorn but actually seemed to be made from plant matter. Anyway here's a photo …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 120 - photo a day 2017
item.description: The day has rolled round and it's been the Dyfi Enduro. The difference this year was that there were 2 routes, the enduro and the bach. The enduro was 55km and the bach 40km, they were similar routes but the bach just cut a few bits out. Looking at the …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 118 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This weekend coming is the Dyfi Enduro. A big ride with over 1000 other riders in the Dyfi forest, mass start in Machynlleth. I thought that it was probably wise to give my bike a service beforehand. I managed to replace the really worn bottom bracket with a slightly worn …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 117 - photo a day 2017
item.description: New phone! I decided to buy a new phone because the charging port on my moto g3 has come to be quite loose. Cables have to be wiggled around to get them to engage and the slightest knock knocks them out. Not great, really annoying when using the phone as …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 116 - photo a day 2017
item.description: My new helmet came today, a Specialized Tactic 2. I decided to buy a new helmet for 2 reasons; my catlike that I use on the road is ancient and my bell super is too warm in summer. I wore it on a ride last night and it's much better …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 115 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Elysia is away for the next 2 days and we haven't been out for food in a while so tonight we went to Casablanca, a favourite of ours. As usual the service was great, really attentive. The food was also really nice, I went for something different to usual and …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 114 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Back to work! This is a screenshot of Cosmic Identity Crisis ready for submission. It's been fun doing a bit of gamedev again and I do seem to still remember stuff. Will have to do another gamejam soon! Play the game on our website.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 113 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I went for a ride on the Mega today to make that it's working OK ahead of the Dyfi Enduro next weekend. I did ~40km and all seems good, a few odd noises to work out but that's nothing new. After my ride I took Elysia out to the cafe …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 112 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This weekend is Ludum Dare #38 gamejam. I'm taking part with Dirty Casuals. Early this morning the theme was released - "A Small World", not a great theme IMO but that's what was voted for. After some discussion we decided to make a game where you play as pluto battling to …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 111 - photo a day 2017
item.description: My new springs and pawls arrived today! This meant that I've been able to fix my rear wheel and ride this weekend. I'm still without the ebike but I popped into Summit Cycles to pick up a chain so asked how it was going at the same time. They're still …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 110 - photo a day 2017
item.description: This evening I decided to give my mega shock a long, long, long overdue strip down and proper service. I've had the seal/orings kit for quite a while but didn't have the tools for removal of the aip cap and the adapter to reinflate the shock. I built the …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 109 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Back to work! What that means is back to normal days with not much exciting. Following on my brief run of productivity yesterday I decided to clean the outside of my windows when I got home, and the inside of some of them. Turns out I didn't do a very …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 108 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I was still off work today and decided that I'd have a nice relaxing day, maybe play some video games. I had a quite productive day instead. I finally went to the tip with all of the fir tree that I chopped down. I cleared weeds and soil from the …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 107 - photo a day 2017
item.description: As my mega is most definitely out of action I decided to try go for a ride on the ebike again. I knew where I want to go, just not how I wanted to get there or back. I set off out toward Capel Dewi and the bike seemed to …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 106 - photo a day 2017
item.description: As I've entered the dyfi enduro I decided that I'd best do a long ride on the mega today to test my legs. I also fitted a dinner plate cassette (11-42) yesterday so wanted to try it. I set out and got up the mountain road feeling pretty good and …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 105 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Went for a ride on my ebike today. When I started I felt like changing mode wasn't doing anything and that eco mode was giving far too much assist. I ignored it thinking maybe it was in my head or something. After a few km the motor started assisting me …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 104 - photo a day 2017
item.description: One way or another I've spent much of today in a car. We stayed at my Dad's partner's house last night after having some food and drinks. I shared a lift with my sister and on the way back to my Dad's we did a delivery to somewhere which proved …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 103 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Today I went to the Dyfi forest on my way back to Oswestry, stopping off in Machynlleth to buy a dyfi enduro ticket. Hopefully my legs will hold up OK for the enduro! The trails today were all riding awesome and I had a lot of fun, new battery appears …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 102 - photo a day 2017
item.description: I totally forgot to take a photo today but I've just remembered so I'm resorting to a backup idea. I've previously mentioned using my fitbit UP3 for sleep tracking so here's a screenshot of yesterday's tracking data. As well as this data if I were to scroll down there's a …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 101 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Another unexciting day. Worked until 18:15, cooked and then gambuildr. For lunch Liam n I went to ultra comida again. They had bottles of a Spanish beer that looked interesting and they were only £1.40 each so I bought one. It was OK, nothing very remarkable about it …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 100 - photo a day 2017
item.description: Woohoo 100 days! Today I took a half day as it was nice outside and I didn't really want to be in work. I drove up to near nant with the mega and rode the top of nant + toboggan. Managed to ride toboggan fully feet up which was a first …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 98 - photo a day 2017
item.description: As the ebike is still off for warranty I decided to head out on my mega today. The weather was really nice (I actually sunburnt) and I fancied toboggan and the secret descent. I spent a while trying to get round the bottom corner on toboggan and I finally managed …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 97 - photo a day
item.description: Liam managed to talk me into driving into town and going to Ultracomida for lunch. It's a great food shop with a tapas restaurant and they also do take out baguettes. I had a tuna and piquante peppers with plenty of olive oil. It was very nice and their bread …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 96 - photo a day
item.description: Today I had an appointment with urodynamics. The appointment was at 9:40 so I rode over and got to the waiting room at 9:35. This was the first time that I've not been straight in. I had to wait less than 10 minutes and I was in. Straight …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 95 - photo a day
item.description: I finished work at 4 and decided that I fancied a ride, but didnt want to be out for hours so went out on the roadrat. I had a plan that I wanted to ride out down the Rheidol valley then cross the river and ride back on the bridleway …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 94 - photo a day
item.description: Tuesday night is gamebuildr meet night. Today was the first evening that I've walked over and it's still been light. It looked quite nice so...
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 93 - photo a day
item.description: Another standard day, always tough after a packed weekend. I really didn't do anything of note today other than being really tired. I made some hake burgers this evening though, so...
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 92 - photo a day
item.description: Long drive home today but it went as well as could be hoped for. I even managed to have a nice meal at my Dad's. I can't not put up a photo from the Dales so here's one from this morning from the back of the house where we stayed …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 91 - photo a day
item.description: Today we went riding at Whinlatter which was a lot of fun. It's a fun place with some great descents and interesting climbs. I took a few good landscape shots but I feel like this photo has to be the one!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 90 - photo a day
item.description: Today I headed up to the Yorkshire Dales to celebrate Ben's 30th. His parents rented a house in the middle of nowhere organised for a group of us to head there with them. Ben wasn't aware of who was going or where he was going. I think he was suprised …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 89 - photo a day
item.description: I wasn't feeling great today but I had a package due to be delivered there so headed in to work. In the end I took the afternoon off as the package was delivered. The package - some new pedals. Spank spoons. They're nice and big at 110x100mm, they actually come in …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 88 - photo a day
item.description: Another standard day. I popped to Morrison's to get some fish and spotted that they had tuna steak, I hadn't had that for ages so bought one. £5.50! That was unexpected but, eh, it's a once in a while thing. I also got a nice bit of salmon fillet …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 87 - photo a day
item.description: Not a very exciting day, the weather is beginning to fade back into rainy now! I needed a couple of things from Charlies Stores again so...
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 86 - photo a day
item.description: Once again, another nice day so another ride! I finished work at 3 and headed up nant with the Mega. I spent a while playing in the skills area, I ain't got any skills. This photo was meant to show the dust on the stanchions with the outline of the …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 84 - photo a day
item.description: I spend this morning sorting out the front lawn, mowing edging etc... First time is always the worst but hopefully I've made the job easier for future me. Paul and I went riding in the afternoon aiming to ride out to the chute but time was getting on a bit …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 83 - photo a day
item.description: Another lovely day so I left work at 3. I didn't really fancy a big ride as my legs were aching a bit so I went out without a plan. I found myself on toboggan and spent about 25 minutes trying to ride one corner, corner 1 - me 0. After …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 82 - photo a day
item.description: Elysia is off to Japan for two weeks and got the 5:30am train this morning so I was up to take her to the station. I managed to get another hour of sleep once I got home and I was in work for 8 on the dot. I was …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 81 - photo a day
item.description: It's been a lovely afternoon so I decided that I'd better go for a ride. I went for a spin up to nant, my balance didn't feel right, and I fell off three times! Nothing serious though. Despite it being a really nice afternoon the trails were still rather wet …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 80 - photo a day
item.description: Tuesday is gamebuilr sprint retrospective/planning night. Once again we met at Bryamlwg. This time I noticed that they have a Murphy's stout on tap and I'm a big fan of stout. Turns out that it's 30p cheaper than a bottle of beer too!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 79 - photo a day
item.description: Tonight Elysia and I went for food at Baravin, as she really want their pulled pork pizza and last time she went they'd run out. We got a table looking out over the sea and it was a pretty nice evening so the view was nice. She managed to have …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 78 - photo a day
item.description: I had intended on riding today but I had a very meh day. I just wasn't feeling it and some days I just get bored of riding the same stuff here. That sounds bad considering the amount of excellent riding we have here but that's just how it is for …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 77 - photo a day
item.description: This weekend Paul has a couple of friends staying so today I joined them for a rideout to nant. The weather was pretty miserable, really misty with a bit of rain and wind. We still stopped at the trailhead for a coffee and at the Tynllidiart arms for a pint …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 76 - photo a day
item.description: Justin was the art director at west coast software whilst I was there. He was Elysia's boss and they're good friends although now that they've both left west coast they don't mett up often. Elysia invited Justin round this evening to have a catch-up over a takeaway. It was a …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 75 - photo a day
item.description: Another pretty normal day, not a lot to say. Weather hasn't been so great today either. Yesterday I chopped out the second tree and had a tidy up in the garden after my ride so today's photo is where I'm at.

item.title: A visit with Urodynamics
item.description: On Thursday I had an appointment at the Urodynamics department in Bronglais. I actually managed to park in the hospital car park for once (yes, I drove the mile there. You try walking that far in an urban environment with a bladder that gets upset by walking!) so was already …

What is it?

item.title: Photo a Day - Giving up
item.description: I've decided to give up on the photo a day, day 50 seemed like a good milestone to stop at. I wanted to try make each photo have a bit of meaning/story to it and that was starting to become harder and harder, not to mention that I didn't …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 50 - Photo a Day
item.description: I've managed 50 days! I realised that I haven't yet done a photo of the coaster I got for doing the Dyfi warmup. It feels very worthy of day 50 :).
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 49 - Photo a Day
item.description: This is the view from the kitchen at work, it's not bad at all! Getting ready to take this photo I saw a red kite and two ducks on the little pond that can't be seen in this photo, rad as.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 47 - Photo a Day
item.description: I can't say much about this one really, other than chilblains! They probably won't fall off, they don't normally fall off.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 45 - Photo a Day
item.description: I don't know what it is with these students but today's ride we meet at 9. 9 on a Saturday! We went up Banc y Darren way and I left them at the top of the leg burner to do some different bits. I'd never ridden the Bony Goch climb …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 44 - Photo a Day
item.description:
Today I decided to go and explore a couple of bridleways up nant, ones I'd not done before.

The first new one linked the highest bit of the mountain road down to the bont goch climb, making more climb before getting to nant. It started off downhill on a double …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 43 - Photo a Day
item.description: Today Andy and Teesh moved in so I decided to bake cupcakes! They're quite simple vanilla ones as I didn't have loads of stuff, I also made buttercream but it was a really strange recipe and didn't work out well.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 42 - Photo a Day
item.description: Today I sorted out my spare room so that Andy and Teesh can move in. It'll be nice to have people around the house! Room took some work to get looking remotely presentable and the windows definitely need replacing!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 41 - Photo a Day
item.description: When I left aber today it was cold and foggy. It continued that way all the way up through Banc y darren but pretty much as soon as I reached the Nant area the clouds parted and the sun came out to play! I stopped at the cafe for a …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 40 - Photo a Day
item.description: This week I have a week off between jobs so I'll most likely ride bikes a bit. However, today I decided to tackle the ceiling in the shower room. It had ceiling tiles that were going a bit mouldy and starting to peel. I managed to get them off, which …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 39 - Photo a Day
item.description: Last night (well, yesterday) I made pulled pork ready for us for when we got in from our ride. It was good, we had it with tikka chicken wings, crusty bread and a BBQ sauce that I made. This bowl was just about full yesterday, this is all that is …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 38 - Photo a Day
item.description: This weekend Rich and Ben are vistiting so today we rode out to Nant via the Bont Goch climb and back down the Ty Cam descent. We had fantastic weather and managed both cake at the VC and beer at the tiddly widdle, good times.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 37 - Photo a Day
item.description: Well today is my last day of working for Exony/eGain so I thought that I'd take a photo of my work setup before it's gone forever more. The laptop has now been sent back to Exony HQ and goodbye's said. On to new things, which is both scary and …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 35 - Photo a Day
item.description: First off, a note that the next 4 days have all been written on the same day but I can assure you that the photos were taken on the respective days. I might start writing more of the posts on the same day when I get round to it, like …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 34 - Photo a Day
item.description: I'm bored of trying to find a chain lube that lasts a long ride here in the winter, all of the ones that I've tried just don't work as well as I'd like. I read about people using putolin which is designed for motorbikes, it's a wax that you soak …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 33 - Photo a Day
item.description: Cut me some slack, I fell off a bike yesterday! Another normal day with nothing exciting to report so it's time for a photo of my food again. This time it's roasted pork belly with steamed vegetables. Good it was too!
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 32 - Photo a Day
item.description: Today, for some unknown reason, I decided to ride my road bike. I was quite bored by the time I got to the end of Bow Street and very nearly just went to Borth and back but I wanted to check out the climb from Talybont to Anglers. The climb …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 31 - Photo a Day
item.description: Hurrah I've managed a whole month of photos! Today I went for a shortish ride up Nant, just toboggan and then over to the main trails and did a Pendam loop. First ride on the 44s and, wow, they're properly nice. Had to back the rebound off a touch as …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 30 - Photo a Day
item.description: Unfortunately today I'm feeling totally washed out, don't know why. I only just remembered to take a photo so it's the delightful view from my bed, you best feel privileged.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 29 - Photo a Day
item.description: Today I finished hanging bits off of the new frame. I've had to bodge the front brake a bit as my mount is 200mm and rotor is 203 so washers were required. Looking forward to riding it now.
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 28 - Photo a Day
item.description: Christmas Eve I had a stack in the Dyfi and whilst correcting my bars Andy noticed that my bottom headset cup was very loose, most likely borked frame. Turns out that Stu, his brother, had an identical frame that I could buy... Whilst at it Andy could sell me his …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 27 - Photo a Day
item.description:
Generally speaking I'm against taking photos of my food but I really wanted to share this one. It's a thai red curry and it's, frankly, just bloody amazing. It's really easy to make, tastes great and the ingredients aren't ridiculously hard to get hold of.The recipe is here.

[Album …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 26 - Photo a Day
item.description: This morning I went for a ride round Nant with Bean, bit of a spin down after the winter warmup. I had a job interview in the afternoon so I didn't want to ride anything too wild! Got offered the job just for reference :). We did a standard YstwythMTB loop …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 25 - Photo a Day
item.description: Today was the Dyfi Winter Warmup. We left around 9:30 to give Taylor time to try buy a ticket, luckily he was able to. We got there around 10:30 and signed on then we started riding at around 11. It was a rad event and we managed 2 …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 24 - Photo a Day
item.description: It's Dyfi winter warmup weekend! Today I picked up Zop from the station and cracked on up to Nant to meet up with Andy and Taylor, although Andy isn't actually riding tomorrow. Turns out that Taylor also doesn't have a ticket, skills. He's going to try talk nicely to the …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 23 - Photo a Day
item.description: This Sunday coming is the Dyfi Winter Warmup. I have people staying with me this weekend as there are a few of us riding the event. Also a small group of us going to riding Nant tomorrow. I have Taylor and Dan staying with me tomorrow night and Dan n …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 22 - Photo a Day
item.description: I'm on a role with these thoroughly uninteresting photos, but I've had some things on my mind of late so hopefully I'll pick it all back up come this weekend! Today is half of a falafel burger, which I what I had for my evening meal - falafel burgers, chips n …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 21 - Photo a Day
item.description:
Another day in the office, followed by a 4 hour drive in the dark. At least I'm now home but it's another uninspired photo! This one of the doors to the office.

Album link
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 20 - Photo a Day
item.description: Being away from home and spending all of my time in the office or where I'm staying is making a photo a bit more difficult. Today we have a photo of my Toshiba Chromebook. It's a good little machine. Boots fast and I like ChromeOS. Aside from the trackpad it …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 19 - Photo a Day
item.description: My new boss is flying over from the US and will be in the office tomorrow so I decided I'd better be in the office. I left straight after work and got to where I'm staying (with a guy from work) around 21:30. This photo is of the room …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 5 - Photo a Day
item.description: First day back at work this year and, as expected, first day when I've been a little lost what to photo. I'm still keen to not just take photos or random stuff and want things that I can write a bit of something about. So today is an indiscriminate bottle …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 4 - Photo a Day 2017
item.description: Today I was due to ride the Red Kite Frozen Devil but I made a call yesterday that I was going to have to bail due to my cold. I arranged to do a bit of nant ride with Andy as he was over this way surfing this morning. I …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 3 - Photo a Day
item.description: Still ill. Luckily, my first The Spicery box arrived today. I got given a subscription for xmas from my family. The idea is that each month you get sent a box with the spices for a meal, you buy the remaining ingredients and make the meal. There's a choice of …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Day 2 - Photo a Day
item.description: Following on yesterday's photo, today I had a bit of a garage sort out. Almost everything on the left through the door (not the lawnmower!) is for the tip. Should be loads of room once all of that stuff is gone :).
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon

item.title: Changing Platform
item.description: I write posts somewhat sporadically and I'm quite good at forgetting how my pelican setup works. For this reason I decided to change the technology behind my blog. Moving away from using pelican and hosting on github pages to Postachio. Postachio is a blogging platform that ties into a handful …
item.dc:creator: Charles Dixon
